```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
withr::with_dir("../", {
  source("functions.R")
})
```

```{r loading}
df_all <- read.table("../processed/all-data.csv", sep=";", head = TRUE)
```

```{r cleaning up}
df_all <- df_all %>%
  filter(source == "paper" | !is.na(ended))
```

```{r occupations}
df_all %>%
  select(source, starts_with("occup_")) %>%
  pivot_longer(-source) %>%
  filter(value == 1) %>%
  ggplot(aes(name)) +
    geom_bar(stat="count") +
    facet_wrap(~source)
```
